attributes.action: Compulsory mud flaps on all vehicles.
attributes.additional_details:
On countless occasions I found visibility whilst driving when it is raining, and even more noticeably after it has stopped raining, is severely reduced by the spray from surface water thrown up  by vehicles. When driving behind a vehicle that has mud flaps fitted I have found the problem greatly reduced.

I would like to suggest that compulsory fitting of mud flaps to all vehicles, i.e. as part of the MOT, would greatly reduce this problem and the inherent danger.
